features.title: Latent Space Mapping
features.description: Analyze how AI models perceive your brand by examining semantic associations in their training data. No guesswork—just observable patterns.

features.title: AI Selection Rate
features.description: Quantify how often AI systems choose your brand when answering queries in your category. The metric that matters in the generative era.

features.title: Competitive Visibility
features.description: See where you stand relative to competitors in the AI's knowledge layer. Understand who gets recommended—and why.

features.title: Schema.org Architecture
features.description: Structured data is the language AI understands. We build machine-readable architecture that makes your content parseable and trustworthy.

features.title: Entity Optimization
features.description: Strengthen your brand's knowledge graph presence. Clear entity relationships mean consistent AI representation across platforms.

features.title: Content Authority Signals
features.description: Establish topical authority through semantic consistency. Align your content with how AI models structure domain expertise.

features.title: AI Agent Compatibility
features.description: Prepare for the autonomous economy. Optimize your data for ACP, MCP, and UCP protocols—the handshakes AI agents use to transact.

features.title: Data Provenance
features.description: Verifiable, trustworthy data is the currency of AI commerce. Establish clear provenance chains that agents can validate.

features.title: Choosability Optimization
features.description: When an AI agent needs to select a vendor, you want to be chosen. Engineer the signals that make you the reliable choice.

features.title: AI-Native Campaigns
features.description: Advertising strategies designed for AI-mediated discovery. Reach audiences through the channels AI systems prioritize.

features.title: Prompt-Optimized Creative
features.description: Content that performs in AI contexts. From search to synthesis, ensure your messaging translates to AI recommendations.

features.title: Performance Measurement
features.description: Track what matters: AI mention rate, recommendation frequency, selection conversion. Metrics for the generative era.
